com.tomscz.afserver.ws.resources

Class CountryResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afserver.ws.resources.BaseResource
      • com.tomscz.afserver.ws.resources.CountryResource

  • @Path(value="/country")
public class CountryResource
extends BaseResource
    This is country resource. This resource provide definition and end points with data and method to work with country.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getResources

        @GET
@Path(value="/definition")
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getResources(@Context
                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method create definition based on is build form and table with countries. Based on user role is form editable or not.
        Parameters:
        request - current request
        Returns:
        Response which contain definition. It is used to build form and table.

      • updateOrCreateCountry

        @POST
@Path(value="/")
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
@RolesAllowed(value="admin")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateOrCreateCountry(Country country)
        This method update or create country. Manager will decide what to do.
        Parameters:
        country - which will be created or updated.
        Returns:
        Response with status code.
